pos review: Very friendly and welcoming staff. Good brasserie for dinner and breakfast.
neg review: Very mediocre cleaning  There were chips in the bed. Smell of dust.

pos review: Staff very accommodating, food fantastic. Clean, quiet and comfortable.
neg review: Don't think there was anything I didn't like.

pos review: bedroom and bathroom both good sizes  location good / parking good / check out good  / Friendly staff
neg review: no complaints, hotel good standard at the right price.

pos review: Liked the look, the rooms, the spacious bathroom the breakfast is to die for, and that's why we keep coming back
neg review: Nothing looks Pretty good to me.

pos review: We were not able to check in before the reception closed. So we called and asked if we could come later. And there a night entrance where the left the room key for me which was very kind!
Very friendly staff, very good breakfast!

Good size room, clean and nice. 
Lovely breakfast and very helpful, kind staff.
neg review: The wallpaper could use some gluing back.some areas of the room had hanging wallpaper. We booked a double room, but our bed was 2 single beds put together with the gap in the middle.
